data.name: Overworld - Map Keeper's Realm
data.detailed_description: Overworld: Map Keeper’s Realm is your tabletop RPG companion. With it, you can quickly and easily sculpt your world, retain its history, and share it with the players. Overworld’s propagating levels enables you to create and detail your whole world with a single map. Other features like points of interest and searchable notes breathe life into your world. Welcome to Map Keeper’s Realm!
data.about_the_game: Overworld: Map Keeper’s Realm is your tabletop RPG companion. With it, you can quickly and easily sculpt your world, retain its history, and share it with the players. Overworld’s propagating levels enables you to create and detail your whole world with a single map. Other features like points of interest and searchable notes breathe life into your world. Welcome to Map Keeper’s Realm!
data.short_description: A 2D map-making tool for creating your fantasy medieval RPG world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OEM (stock) or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
